index.title: COVID-19 Vaccination Cancellation Waiting Lists in Japan

add-clinic.fillForm: Fill out this form to add a new clinic to the database that has a cancellation waiting list.
add-clinic.reviewMessage: The clinic you submitted will be displayed after it's been reviewed!

validations.cityValidation: City name must be at least 2 characters
validations.wardValidation: Ward name must be at least 2 characters
validations.clinicValidation: Clinic name must be at least 2 characters

about.whatIsThisA: This is a community-driven database to help spread information on clinics that are offering waiting lists for vaccinations so they don't go to waste.
about.trustA: All of the links lead to official resources such as clinic and government websites. Please read them thorougly before registering your personal information with them.
about.creatorA: This site was created and maintained by me, LaShawn Toyoda! If you have any trouble using the site or come across incorrect or outdated information, please contact me through Twitter {0}
about.supportQ: How can I help support the database?
about.supportA: The best way to help is by submitting any cancellation waiting lists you come across to the database. If you're feeling extra generous, please buy me a kofi!
